name: AttacKnight
description:
Battle as the AttacKnight against the endless hordes of the Crystal Wizard and save the kingdom! 

Post your High Score below!

Controls

Arrows -Move

Z-Attack

Hold Z-Charge Attack

X-Shield

Made for the ScoreWars jam to challenge arcade professional players. 

Credits:

Zack Crozier - Gameplay Music
